book.synopsis: Moving back and forth between the two main characters, Hailey and Sam, a kaleidoscopic novel follows two wayward teenagers who never grow up as they crash New Orleans parties, barrel up the Mississippi, crash through the Badlands, and more, from the Civil War to the Iraq War and beyond. By the author of House of Leaves. 100,000 first printing.
book.dimensions: Height: 9.52 Inches, Length: 5.81 Inches, Weight: 1.75 Pounds, Width: 1.19 Inches
